grondag.frex.api.material

Interface Uniform

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Uniform.Uniform1f, Uniform.Uniform1i, Uniform.Uniform2f, Uniform.Uniform2i, Uniform.Uniform3f, Uniform.Uniform3i, Uniform.Uniform4f, Uniform.Uniform4i, Uniform.UniformArrayf, Uniform.UniformArrayi, Uniform.UniformMatrix4f

    @API(status=EXPERIMENTAL)
public interface Uniform
    Interfaces for uniform initialization. Called by renderer when uniform should be potentially updated from game state.

    See ShaderManager and UniformRefreshFrequency

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String UNIFORM_EYE_POSITION
      Uniform.Uniform3f with viewing entity eye position.
      static java.lang.String UNIFORM_FOG_ATTRIBUTES
      Uniform.Uniform3f with fog parameters: end, end-start, and density.

      Uniform.Uniform3f with current fog color.

    • Field Detail

      • UNIFORM_MODEL_VIEW

        static final java.lang.String UNIFORM_MODEL_VIEW
        Uniform.UniformMatrix4f with current model view matrix. Binding: u_modelView. Refreshed on load.

        Uniform.UniformMatrix4f with current model view projection matrix. Binding: u_modelViewProjection. Refresh on load.

        static final java.lang.String UNIFORM_PROJECTION
        Uniform.UniformMatrix4f with current projection matrix. Binding: u_projection. Refresh on load.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNIFORM_TIME

        static final java.lang.String UNIFORM_TIME
        Uniform.Uniform1f with current game time for animation. Refreshed every frame.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNIFORM_EYE_POSITION

        static final java.lang.String UNIFORM_EYE_POSITION
        Uniform.Uniform3f with viewing entity eye position. Refreshed every frame.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNIFORM_FOG_ATTRIBUTES

        static final java.lang.String UNIFORM_FOG_ATTRIBUTES
        Uniform.Uniform3f with fog parameters: end, end-start, and density. Zero density means linear fog. Refreshed every tick.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNIFORM_FOG_COLOR

        static final java.lang.String UNIFORM_FOG_COLOR
        Uniform.Uniform3f with current fog color. Refreshed every tick.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
